question: [File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: prune()] [Write Permissions] Do all write operations check that the database is not in read-only mode, or could pruning attempt writes on read-only databases? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: prune()] [Reorg Handling] If a blockchain reorg occurs during pruning, could the pruner delete transactions that are still needed for the canonical chain, causing irrecoverable data loss? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: prune()] [Query Consistency] During the window between hash index deletion (line 43) and transaction data deletion (line 47), could queries using TransactionByHashSchema find hash but fail to load transaction? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: prune()] [Account Index Race] If an account query reads TransactionSummariesByAccountSchema after summary deletion (line 53) but before progress update (line 54), could it return inconsistent results? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: new()] [Metadata Injection] If an attacker can corrupt ledger_db metadata before new() is called, could they set TransactionPrunerProgress to a high value, causing mass deletion on initialization? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: get_pruning_candidate_transactions()] [Seek Failure] If iter.seek(&start) at line 117 seeks to wrong position due to database corruption, could this cause pruning of wrong version range without detection? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/pruner/ledger_pruner/transaction_pruner.rs] [Function: prune()] [Indexer Write Failure] At line 67, if indexer write succeeds but ledger write at line 73 fails and causes unwinding, is the indexer write automatically rolled back? (Critical)
